DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to define pathophysiological subtypes of abnormalities in subjects with cocaine dependence.
DOC.brief_title: Pathophysiological Subtyping of Abnormalities in Cocaine Dependence - 9
DOC.detailed_description: The objective of this study is to define subgroups of patients with differential treatment outcome on the basis of differential baseline electrophysiological clusters.
